snippet: The police said that the woman was shot in the arm while inside her car, outside her father’s house. She fled in her car onto the campus of the small university, where the crime was reported.

byline.contributor: Kenan Christiansen, Penn Bullock and Chris Duray contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The police said that the woman was shot in the arm while inside her car, outside her father’s house. She fled in her car onto the campus of the small university, where the crime was reported.

headline.main: Woman Shot Near Campus in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Woman Shot Near Campus in New Jersey
